select RULE_ID "ruleId",RULE_NAME "ruleName",RULE_SEQ "sequence",RULE_HOURS "criticalHours",RULE_FIXCOST "fixCost",RULE_OUTCOST "outCost" ,RULE_STATE "state",PARM_VAL "stateName",to_char(RULE_CDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') "createTime" from T_RULE r,T_PARM p
r.RULE_STATE=p.PARM_VAL and p.PARM_PID=12
and RULE_NAME like '%${ruleName}%'
and RULE_SEQ=#{sequence}
and RULE_STATE=#{state}
and RULE_CDATE >=to_date('${sTime}','YYYY-MM-DD')
and RULE_CDATE <=to_date('${eTime}','YYYY-MM-DD')
order by RULE_CDATE desc,RULE_SEQ asc
